text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: (–And so it finally came, All Hooves' Day.)

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: We have a haunted house on the 3rd floor! Please come visit!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Ah, well it's less of a haunted house and more of a Demon Queen Castle - a most awesome and precious castle made through the efforts of many Uma Musume!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: Heey! It's about time to swap Demon Queen Castle promotion duties!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: HEY☆YO! Leave the rest to us～!!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Oh you're here…! Thank you very much!! Then, I shall take you up on that offer, and hand over this duty to you…!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: This way to Demon Queen Windy-chan's Castle's reception desk～…!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Digitan has returned from her promotion duties! How do things look on this end? Are there a lot of people going in…!?

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Welcome back…! Uhm… the last person in line just went in… I'd say there's quite a lot of people coming…!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Whoa, as expected of our Demon Queen Castle…!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: However, the two of us have the weakest promo power among the Four Heavenly Lords. I'm sure we will be getting even more customers now!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: (Feet knocking screams could be heard at our amazing Demon Queen Windy-chan Castle exhibit all throughout the All Hooves' Day festival…)

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: (Or they would be, however it was mostly the sound of laughter from all the pranks laid out, and screams admiring Demon Queen Windy-chan's cuteness.)

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: (And then—)

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Break time…! I can either watch some auditorium ceremonies, watch all the plays I can… or head over to the food stalls…!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: T-There's so much to do…! But, this is heaven…!!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: …Huh? The next ceremony is… the closing ceremony 2 hours from now?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: …It's already ending?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: (I didn't notice the sun set, as I continued running around the festival. The end of All Hooves' Day – All that's left is the clean up, as well as closing party.)

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: (A bright and blazing bonfire. Girls dancing around in pairs. Unsold festival items along with girls partaking in said items.)

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: (Lots of Uma Musume are engaged in excitement right in front of me, meanwhile I–)
(CHOMP!!)

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: OW!? I-I was bitten…!?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: That shadow, it couldn't be… please wait～～!!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: Ah, Digital! …Wait, let me guess. You were also bitten by someone, then you decided to chase that shadow until you ended up here?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: By "Also"…does that mean everyone here was also bitten? Doto-san, Helios-san… everyone in the Demon Queen Army is here!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: Bwahahaha! Everyone, you have all become prey to Windy-chan's bite～

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: How disappointing, you all let your guard down! Times like this are when Demon Queen Windy-chan does all her dirty deeds—

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: (Suddenly–)

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: (As if to cut off our Demon Queen's words, a bright light flashed over the rooftop.)

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: Whoa! It looks amazing!! Just as I thought, this was the best spot to watch it～!!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: …Hm? No way, is this the reason you lead us to the roof—

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: What a totes bussin reward! Sheesh! Our Demon Queen!! IS THE G.O.A.T.～～!!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: H-Hmph! Don't get the wrong idea!!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: Well, the Demon Queen Castle Project was a great, great, great success! …As your Demon Queen, I have nothing to give but my gratitude.

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Windy-san… thank you very much. This year's All Hooves' Day was so much fun.

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: But… now that it's ending, I feel kind of lonely.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: (…Yes, it truly is lonely.)

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: (But I feel just about– No, I feel a lot happier than I am lonely. Right now—)

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: (I have walked beyond my invisible filter, and am now living together with all of you.)
